org.fcrepo.http.commons

Class AbstractResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource

  • public class AbstractResource
extends Object
    Superclass for Fedora JAX-RS Resources, providing convenience fields and methods.

    ajs6f
